channel.title: Compiler help
channel.description:
javac är inte ett internt kommando, externt kommando, program eller kommandofil. Tryck ned valfri tangent för att fortsätta... javac is an internal command, external command, program or batch file. Press any key to continue ...
i can change to java but it's still not working when compile
@echo off title Maxtix Client Compiler javac -deprecation -Xlint:unchecked -d bin/ -cp dest/jgoodies-looks-2.5.0.jar;dest/libs.jar;dest/oalnf.jar;dest/substance-lookfeel.jar; -sourcepath src src/*.java pause
hmm anyone know what the prob is? when removing C from javac this happens
Unrecognized option: -deprecation Error: Could not create the Java Virtual Machine. Error: A fatal exception has occurred. Program will exit. Tryck ned valfri tangent för att fortsätta...
@echo off title Maxtix Client Compiler java -deprecation -Xlint:unchecked -d bin/ -cp dest/jgoodies-looks-2.5.0.jar;dest/libs.jar;dest/oalnf.jar;dest/substance-lookfeel.jar; -sourcepath src src/*.java pause

item.title: Compiler help
item.dc:creator: @alex321 alex321
item.description:
@alex321 wrote:

javac är inte ett internt kommando, externt kommando, program eller kommandofil. Tryck ned valfri tangent för att fortsätta...

javac is an internal command, external command,
program or batch file.
Press any key to continue …

i can change to java but it’s still not working

when compile

@echo off title Maxtix Client Compiler javac -deprecation -Xlint:unchecked -d bin/ -cp dest/jgoodies-looks-2.5.0.jar;dest/libs.jar;dest/oalnf.jar;dest/substance-lookfeel.jar; -sourcepath src src/*.java pause
hmm anyone know what the prob is?

when removing C from javac this happens

Unrecognized option: -deprecation Error: Could not create the Java Virtual Machine. Error: A fatal exception has occurred. Program will exit. Tryck ned valfri tangent för att fortsätta...
@echo off title Maxtix Client Compiler java -deprecation -Xlint:unchecked -d bin/ -cp dest/jgoodies-looks-2.5.0.jar;dest/libs.jar;dest/oalnf.jar;dest/substance-lookfeel.jar; -sourcepath src src/*.java pause
